title: Project-Based Mathematics Education Design to Overcome Intergenerational Learning Barriers

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical concepts and work-based application experience
context.additional_context: Intergenerational collaborative projects solving mathematical problems in corporate environments.

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three personal barriers (e.g., showing off experience) occurring during intergenerational knowledge sharing and develop resolution strategies
Learners can design collaboration protocols to improve intergenerational communication issues in project-based work environments
Learners can analyze cases where lack of managerial support acts as a learning barrier and propose improvement measures
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
